notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was supported by Fundação de Amparo a Pesquisa do Estado do Rio de Janeiro FAPERJ to ELA grant number E-26/110.843/2013 and to FBS grant number E-26/202.003/2016, to Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq) grant number 30382202015-5 to FBS, to Financiadora de Estudos e Projetos FINEP number 04.16.0058.00 to FBS, to Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES) and CNPq for the students fellowships. The funders had no role in the study design, data collection, analysis and decision to publish or preparation of the manuscript.
